title: Data Card for Spotify
description: 动态生成 Spotify 数据，嵌入你的 README 或网站。
description:en-US: Dynamically generated Spotify data to embed in your README or website.

querys.name: show_border
querys.description: 是否在数据卡片周围显示白色边框
querys.description:en-US: Whether or not to show a white border around the data card

querys.name: show_date
querys.description: 是否显示数据卡片生成时的日期和时间
querys.description:en-US: Whether or not to show the date and time that the data card was generated

querys.name: time_zone
querys.moreDescription:en-US: Refer to [List of tz database time zones](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones#List).

querys.name: hide_title
querys.description:en-US: Whether or not to hide the title

querys.name: hide_explicit
querys.description: 是否全局隐藏限制级曲目
querys.description:en-US: Whether or not to hide explicit tracks from all sections

querys.name: hide_playing
querys.description: 是否隐藏正在收听部分
querys.description:en-US: Whether or not to hide the "Currently Listening To" section

querys.name: hide_recents
querys.description: 是否隐藏最近播放的曲目部分
querys.description:en-US: Whether or not to hide the "Recently Played Tracks" section

querys.name: hide_top_tracks
querys.description: 是否隐藏热门歌曲部分
querys.description:en-US: Whether or not to hide the "Top Tracks" section

querys.name: hide_top_artists
querys.description: 是否隐藏热门艺术家部分
querys.description:en-US: Whether or not to hide the "Top Artists" section

querys.name: limit
querys.description: 每部分显示的曲目数量
querys.description:en-US: Number of tracks to show per section
